entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
